title: Yosemite National Park
name: Mirror Lake/Meadow
alt: 2 mi (3.2 km) to Mirror Lake, 5 mi (8 km) around the lake
address: Starts from the Mirror Lake trailhead shuttle bus stop (#17)
content: [[File:Handicap reverse blue background.svg|text-bottom|15px|frameless]] The trail leads along an old road to what is a large pond in spring and a meadow the rest of the year.  The largely dry lake is mostly a meadow that is at the bottom of Half Dome and provides excellent views.  Those who are interested can also hike around the lake bed.
